Name: Illusive Platform
Author: Illusive Networks
Description:
The Illusive Platform solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest Illusive Platformâ€™s attack surface analysis data and incident logs into Microsoft Sentinel and view this information in dedicated dashboards that offer insight into your organization's attack surface risk (ASM Dashboard) and track unauthorized lateral movement in your organization's network (ADS Dashboard). 

 **Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

 This solution takes a dependency on the following technologies, and some of these dependencies either may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or might result in additional ingestion or operational costs:

 a. [Agent-based log collection (CEF over Syslog)](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-common-event-format)
